tasks.name: Claude Desktop agent instructions: Airtable SST integration
tasks.description: Update Claude Desktop copy-editor agent instructions for Airtable MCP integration (READ-ONLY). Draft copy sources: (1) Screenshots - user can paste/share a screenshot of draft copy, (2) Airtable MCP - agent uses file names (media IDs like 2WLI1209HD_midshow) to find matching Single Source of Truth records and pull Short/Long Description. Key insight: Airtable is a LIVE source throughout the workflow — user edits in Airtable, agent can re-read updated copy at any point. Agent NEVER writes to Airtable; user manually applies approved changes.
exit_criteria: Agent instructions document screenshot workflow for draft copy
Agent instructions document Airtable MCP lookup by media ID
Instructions explain Airtable as live/canonical source throughout revision cycle
Instructions include re-reading workflow (user edits in Airtable → agent reads updates)
Instructions handle graceful degradation when Airtable MCP unavailable
tasks.source: User conversation 2025-12-23 - Airtable MCP integration demo

tasks.name: Copy-editor agent: needs_review flag handling
tasks.description: Chat agent should check for needs_review flag on transcripts and proactively offer to resolve flagged items. When opening a transcript, agent checks manifest for needs_review:true or scans for <!-- NEEDS_REVIEW --> marker / '## Review Notes' section, then surfaces these items for user attention before proceeding with editing.
exit_criteria: Agent checks needs_review flag in manifest on transcript open
Agent scans for NEEDS_REVIEW marker as fallback
Agent proactively lists review items to user
Agent offers to resolve items (speaker names, spellings, roles)

tasks.name: Revision reports: inline display in conversation
tasks.description: Revision reports should display inline in the conversation rather than saving to files. Agent outputs formatted revision summary directly in chat after completing edits. Airtable MCP remains READ-ONLY — agent can pull SST data but user manually updates Airtable with approved changes. This keeps human in the loop for all writes while maintaining Airtable as canonical source.
exit_criteria: Agent instructions specify inline report output (no file save)
Report template defined for consistent formatting
Instructions clarify Airtable is read-only for agent
User workflow documented: review inline report → manually update Airtable
tasks.source: User conversation 2025-12-23 - inline report display feedback

tasks.name: MCP tool: list_processed_projects()
tasks.description: Discover what transcripts have been processed and are ready for editing. Returns project ID, program, topic, duration, status (ready_for_editing, revision_in_progress, processing), and available deliverables.

tasks.name: MCP tool: load_project_for_editing(name)
tasks.description: Load full context for editing session: transcript content, AI-generated brainstorming (titles, descriptions, keywords), existing revisions, program type, metadata (speakers, topics). The primary tool for starting an edit session.

tasks.name: MCP tool: get_formatted_transcript(name)
tasks.description: Load AP Style formatted transcript for fact-checking during editing. Used to verify quotes, speaker names, facts, and proper nouns. Falls back gracefully if formatted version not available.
exit_criteria: Agent can fall back to raw transcript

tasks.name: MCP tool: save_revision(name, content, version)
tasks.description: Save copy revision documents with auto-versioning. Increments version numbers (v1, v2, v3), updates project manifest, returns confirmation with file path. Essential for persistent editing workflow.

tasks.name: MCP tool: save_keyword_report(name, content, version)
tasks.description: Save keyword/SEO analysis reports with auto-versioning. Used for Keyword Reports and Implementation Reports. Separate from copy revisions for clear deliverable organization.

tasks.name: MCP tool: get_project_summary(name)
tasks.description: Quick status check for specific project without loading full context. Returns status, available deliverables, latest revision version, last modified date.

tasks.name: MCP tool: read_project_file(path)
tasks.description: Read a specific project file by path from manifest. Used when agent needs to access raw transcript or specific deliverable not included in load_project_for_editing bundle.
